RECOMMENDATION
WHO and UNICEF recommend iodine supplementation for pregnant and lactating women 
in countries where less than 20% of households have access to iodized salt, until the salt 
iodization programme is scaled up. Countries with a household access to iodized salt 
between 20% and 90% should make efforts to accelerate salt iodization or assess the 
feasibility of increasing iodine intake in the form of a supplement or iodine fortified foods 
by the most susceptible groups (137).
